journalEntries.content: Practiced querySelector and querySelectorAll. querySelector will only choose the first element that it finds. querySelectorAll will find all the elements. I had to use a for loop during the exercises using querySelectorAll. 'The document.querySelector() method allows you to identify the first element that matches the CSS selector you specify.' 'If you want to get a list of all components that match your selector, you need to use the document.querySelectorAll() method.'
